name: Poosh Button
description:
Hello! Thanks for checking out Poosh Button! This is a fun little package that you can spend some time on. If you're bored or want a "nice" challenge, you'll probably want to turn to this. 

This full version features the classic clicker mode, as well as the practice, arcade and multiplayer modes. I will be uploading a demo in a couple weeks (maybe a bit longer), so if you want to get the full version for free, get it now!

Have fun. :I

NOTE TO MAC USERS: This game cannot yet run directly on a Mac. While I'm working on the Mac release, here are a few suggestions on how to run this game on this WikiHow page: https://www.wikihow.com/Open-Exe-Files-on-Mac
